Hi! I am a tooltip.

You have woken up

You look around and find yourself in an unfamiliar place, in a courtyard of sorts. You don't remember how you got here. Behind you is a closed gate leading to a prison. Ahead of you is a strange set of tiles and a closed door. The walls are too high to scale, the giant door too tough to break open. You have to figure out how to escape this room.

You have completed the first stage

You may proceed to the next stage.

You have completed the second stage

You may proceed to the next stage.

Congratulations you have escaped

You step out of the final enclosure thinking freedom awaits you. Instead what you find is an empty, flat expanse stretching out before you endlessly into the fog covered horizon. Suddenly you hear a voice. It doesn't sound human, but artificial and robotic sounding. The voice echoes loud, and clear, resonating all throughout the space. You cannot pinpoint what direction the voice is coming from. "Observations complete. We thank you for your participation test candidate. You have served us well," the voice says. "Initiating termination sequence." "Wait!" You call out frantically to the voice. "Why am I here? Who are you? What do you mean termin--"
